siteMetadata.title: Paul Waweru
siteMetadata.subtitle: Software Engineer. Passion for travel and food. North London is Red. Navigating through this thing called life.

frontmatter.title: Startup Life
frontmatter.description: I'm building a startup. Yes, you read correctly. That thing where literally everyone says is far too high risk and you should stick to your stable corporate job? Yes, that's what I'm trying to do. Read more if you're interested in my journey...
